text: nam akasatt ninn vellam irakkiyitt atumulam manusyarkkum kalikalkkum bhaksikkanulla bhumiyile sasyannal itakalarnnu valarnnu. annane bhumi atinre alankaramaniyukayum, at alakarnnatakukayum, avayeakke karasthamakkan tannalkk kaliyumarayenn atinre utamasthar vicarikkukayum ceytappealata oru ratriyea pakalea nam'mute kalpana atin vannettukayum, taledivasam avayeannum avite nilaninnitteyillatta mattil namavaye unmulanam ceyyappetta avasthayilakkukayum ceyyunnu. itupeale matramakunnu aihikajivitattinre upama. cintikkunna alukalkku venti aprakaram nam telivukal visadikarikkunnu
